DESCRIPTION: Sealed cards remain in the discard pile when you shuffle and are un-sealed. Sealing a card triggers any exhaust or discard effects.
Some Curses can be Cleansed by fulfilling the condition on the card. When fulfilled, the curse can be replaced with your choice of card from another class.
When Cursed exceeds an enemy's current HP, it will be killed and transformed into a special card. Cursed enemies will heal 10% of their missing HP each turn.
